column5: Or not!!! What a gong show this looks like.
just like simoce on a slow day lol
That's Simcoe on a good day Dave.  Before I had my fish trap to hide in...I had people cut holes closer then that to me when I was having a good day.
Like the day the guy started chipping the hole open RIGHT in front of Terry's Clam door!! lol

Crazy video Dave.  They use to have something similar on Simcoe where the 1st place prize was a new truck.  Don't think that is going on anymore.  That is priceless Wayne!  lol.  A couple of years ago we had punched a bunch of holes for the group I was fishing with and had some guy just walk up and start fishing them. Chipping a hole in front of the hut has that beat hands down though.  I'm sure Terry would have some words of encouragement for that guy.
I'd fish it, the prize list is unreal....would be a cool experience.
holy crap , wonder what its like from the fish's point of view  .. lol probably more of a social gathering for charity than fishing anyways
They have one here in Barrie.  I like fishing the area after the tourny. Lots of open hole to use.LOL  http://www.icefishingbarrie.ca/
Temagami did a 1000 holes from the town dock almost out to my place for the CTV derby, one fish caught! LOL. We just stayed clear of the whole thing...

We have one in alexandria that's over 1000 anglers every year...  50+ places get prizes... 1&2 are 4 wheelers... There's guided fishing and hunting trips... All kinds of great prizes  That being said... With 1000+ people fishing a small pond/lake for pike it's pretty much a lotto...
Looks like a double thread on the same subject. Crazy.
